nodes.text: An Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt was situated near the planet of Ord Mantell in the Bright Jewel system. A debris of a vessel was known to be strewn among the asteroids. The asteroid belt was mined by the Dynath Miners during the Galactic Civil War. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Black Sun pirates targeted Dynathian transports in the Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt. Car'das starfighters dispatched by Laetin A'shera finally repelled Black Sun forces and escorted Dynathian ships safely back to the H-5 70 Mining Facility.

The Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
